questions.question: Published parameters can only provide their value to one parameter in a workspace.
Which of the following is a good scenario to use a shared private parameter?
options: You want the user to be able to choose the directory to write read data.
You want the user to be able to choose the directory to write their data.
You have multiple transformers with a Tolerance parameter, and 1) you want them to use the same value and 2) you don't want the end-user to set that value.
You need the user to provide their own API key before running the workspace.

questions.question: To share a user parameter, you must right-click it in the Navigator and select Share User Parameter.
